channel.title: Error when doing play offline
channel.description:
ok i made a batch file to run this and this i get on screen
C:\Documents and Settings\bjorn\Application Data\.minecraft>java -Xmx1024M -Xms5 12M -cp Minecraft.jar net.minecraft.LauncherFrame java.io.FileNotFoundException: C:\Documents and Settings\bjorn\Application Data\ .minecraft\lastlogin (Het systeem kan het opgegeven bestand niet vinden) at java.io.FileInputStream.open(Native Method) at java.io.FileInputStream.<init>(FileInputStream.java:106) at net.minecraft.LoginForm.readUsername(LoginForm.java:72) at net.minecraft.LoginForm.<init>(LoginForm.java:42) at net.minecraft.LauncherFrame.<init>(LauncherFrame.java:20) at net.minecraft.LauncherFrame.main(LauncherFrame.java:137) 28 Loading: net.java.games.input.DirectAndRawInputEnvironmentPlugin ########## GL ERROR ########## @ Post render 1280: Invalid enum
rep++ if you can help :D

item.title: Error when doing play offline
item.dc:creator: @whattehp406 whattehp406
item.description:
@whattehp406 wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:13, topic:377247”][quote author=whattehp406 link=topic=473152.msg3461035#msg3461035 date=1294479445]

If you’re trying to play without buying it, you don’t deserve help. Just saying.
[/quote]i’m going to buy when game is completed
i aint gonna buy beta and then have to pay again

You can’t read or are confused or something. That ‘clause’ wasn’t removed for beta because it is still there even now, it states that if you buy the beta you get the full game for free. In other words, if you buy now you DON’T have to buy it ever again…[/quote]confused
i wonna test it first but i have no money on internet atm
my dad is pretty old-school so he wont even let me buy it

Read full topic

item.title: Error when doing play offline
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“whattehp406, post:12, topic:377247”][quote author=Lin link=topic=473152.msg3460489#msg3460489 date=1294439401]
If you’re trying to play without buying it, you don’t deserve help. Just saying.
[/quote]i’m going to buy when game is completed
i aint gonna buy beta and then have to pay again[/quote]

You can’t read or are confused or something. That ‘clause’ wasn’t removed for beta because it is still there even now, it states that if you buy the beta you get the full game for free. In other words, if you buy now you DON’T have to buy it ever again…

Read full topic

item.title: Error when doing play offline
item.dc:creator: @HcoJustin HcoJustin
item.description:
@HcoJustin wrote:

[quote=“m.dog311, post:10, topic:377247”][quote author=gravenfire23 link=topic=473152.msg3460833#msg3460833 date=1294461100]
No point in buying it now when you can play it for free seeing as how when the beta is over you will have to buy agian unless you bought during alpha
[/quote]
wat…

[quote]What you get for purchasing
Please note that Minecraft is currently a work in progress and NOT a finished product! The sandbox mode available right now. However, you may buy a discounted beta account today, which will also include the full game![/quote]
http://minecraft.net/copyright.jsp[/quote]

The clause about all future updates for free was removed for beta. So yes, when the full game comes out you get it and bug fixes, but when new content and such comes out you have to buy those packs if you didn’t get it in alpha

Read full topic

wat…

What you get for purchasing Please note that Minecraft is currently a work in progress and NOT a finished product! The sandbox mode available right now. However, you may buy a discounted beta account today, [b]which will also include the full game![/b]
http://minecraft.net/copyright.jsp

item.title: Error when doing play offline
item.dc:creator: @HcoJustin HcoJustin
item.description:
@HcoJustin wrote:

The exception is from not being able to find the lastlogin file. Is your account valid? If not you might want to try and find one.

The GL error is something wrong on notch’s part I’m assuming

Read full topic
